content:
25. (D) explaining why median life expectancy is so much higher today than in the past.
26. (A) the age that half of all people will live to, or will live beyond.
27. (A) It is now possible to accurately predict how long an individual will live.
28. (A) will probably live somewhat longer than people who reached adulthood in the Stone Age.
29. (A) continue to live for many more years.
30. (B) We’re all much better off in the modern world, where children can safely grow up.
